title: Stop the Presses
content:
sket near X:-1029, Y:1058) Adventurers, Our Best Hope for the City (in a basket near X:-1029, Y:1013) Celebrate the Brave Heroes Who Slew General Ketheric (in a basket behind Ettvard)

If you freed Dolly Dolly Dolly from the Moonlantern in Act 2, the press recognizes the party and offers to help. Otherwise, you need to persuad it. Insert the "Make Big Money By Trading With Adventures" or "Cutest Cat You've Ever Seen" into the printing press to protect your reputation. As of patch 3, killing Ettv
